nodes.text: Fegorosk IV was a planet in the Fegorosk system in the Obtrexta sector of the Outer Rim Territories.

Fegorosk IV was known for its swuvehorn clubs. This attraction was so well known that a recreation of the planet was included in scenic replicators so that persons could experience the location in holographic form. One such scenic replicator that included Fegorosk IV was present in the Arcade Omicron cantina on the planet Bescane.

During Operation Death-Hunter, the swoop gang leader, Cooper Dray and Rebel spy, Lady Amber Comark used the replication of the planet to hide their delicate topic of conversation from the other patrons of the Arcade Omicron.
